item.title: Version 1.0.3
item.description:
Welcome to the first public release of IHBD Summit
We’re excited to launch the initial production version of IHBD Summit, designed to deliver a smooth and reliable experience for conference attendees.
What’s included in this release
Core app features fully enabled for public use
Improved performance and overall stability
UI and navigation refinements based on closed testing feedback
Bug fixes and edge-case handling improvements
Compatibility with the latest Android versions
